website_summaries.verdict: This complete kit includes bottles for storing and drinking.
pros: Doesn't take long to set up
Good SCOBY that's thick and healthy
A decent amount of starter tea
cons: Only enough sugar and tea for a single batch in this kit

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy, home Kombucha!
customer_reviews.text: I used to make Kefir water and my husband didn't care for it so I tried Kombucha instead. Holy moly, my picky husband likes this and even going to buy me the bottles to store them. haha.. The kit came in good packaging and Scoby was very healthy. The instruction was clear and easy to follow. I used blueberry and peach for 2nd fermentation and they are gggggggreat!. Not only brewing my own saves me money but also I can flavor them however I like it. I'm on my 3rd brewing and Scoby is growing like crazy. I thought of buying another one but didn't need it. I separated them and now I have two jars going. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cielbleu

customer_reviews.title: This brew kit is the perfect way to get started
customer_reviews.text: This brew kit is the perfect way to get started. I researched kombucha making for several years before finally choosing this kit. The instructions were easy, the SCOBY is healthy and looks great, and the tea is delicious. I fermented my first batch and it was delicious. I continue to make kombucha with this SCOBY and it has been turning out very well. I have been keeping my finished product in wide mouth canning jars and I use the plastic wide-mouth caps and store it in the fridge. It is so much fun to experiment with different flavors, ferment times, and different kinds of teas. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya J

customer_reviews.title: GROSS
customer_reviews.text: My product grew mold. Not sure why, maybe the scoby was bad? It smells like baby poop, nothing like any Kombucha I have ever tasted. I wish I would not have spent the money on this but live and learn. I followed the directions perfectly my container was never tampered with. I will continue to purchase in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super fun easy kit
customer_reviews.text: Ok this kit is great for a starter kit but be prepared to get addicted to being a mad scientist. The whole process is so easy. Patience and water are the only things not included. I already have more batches going and tons of ideas. The Big Book of Kombucha I highly recommend. I wish the Kombucha Shop would offer the tea (loose leaf) to buy through Amazon. I'd gladly stock up. I did two kinds for my first batch after bottling. Regular and fresh ginger. Both are fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Brew your own is best!
customer_reviews.text: I've made my first batch of Kombucha! Everything went well. The scoby was very healthy and produced a large 2nd scoby from them first batch! I used fresh blueberries and raspberries in the second brewing and it's the best kombucha I have ever tasted! The directions were simple and everything worked exactly as stated. The only thing I added was a brew belt and thermostat to keep my temp constant. I live in the north and had several very cold evenings so the brew belt really did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first Kombucha brew and it was a success! The kit gives you everything you need to get started and most importantly the instructions are super SUPER easy to follow. I choose not to get the deluxe kit wit the included bottles and bought the 16.oz single serving bottles instead separately. These bottles look great and are borosilicate glass which is non pores and higher quality than normal glass. These ones include polyseal tops that will be airtight to help with your second fermentation.
customer_reviews.author: SashaSasha

customer_reviews.title: Easy starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried kombucha for its health benefits and fell I love with it. I've been drinking so much that it became apparent that I should make it myself. This kit made it so easy. I started the day I receive it and have thoroughly enjoyed it. I get great satisfaction from creating my own healthy drink. I love that the kit contained all that I needed to get started (except the water of course). The instructions card is easy to read and follow. I keep it tacked to my refrigerator for quick reference. I love, love, love this kit. I love my booch. I love how much money I'm saving.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly simple, simply perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfect for a beginner like me. The kit has everything for a brew, the instructions are clear, and their website has great support for additional questions. First gallon yielded 6 bottles, each of which got different levels of sugar/ingredients as I experimented for carbonation/flavor. My second batch I messed up, and had to toss it. A little bit of research on their website taught me what I did wrong. Third batch is in process and looks like the first, so I'm back on track. Usually I avoid extra accessories, but The Kombucha Shop has earned my trust, so next step is to buy a heat wrap for brewing during winter. Bottomline: great quality, value, and support.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I am not easily impressed and usually find most all inclusive kits heavily lacking. However, this kit had me absolutely floored at just how complete it was. Hell it even includes the dry erase marker to write on the side of the jar. The steps were easy to read and we have our first batch going strong now. We are about 2 weeks in and it looks great so far. I’ll update if it goes horribly wrong but I have to say this has been a fun first step into making Kombucha for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for the Perfect Item

customer_reviews.title: Nice kombucha starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I started enjoying drinking kombucha, but it's so expensive in stores. With this kit, it is easy to make your first batch. At first, I reused my old kombucha bottles, but I found that using grolsch bottles to be more convenient. I also bought a second 1 gallon jar to store the new scobys that are formed. (I bought this for $44.99, but now it's listed at $138.91. Must be a typo somewhere.) You could probably get all the components for this kit for cheaper, but it's really convenient to just buy a kit. Homemade kombucha tastes great. So far I'm on my 9th batch.
customer_reviews.author: milray

customer_reviews.title: Turned out fantastic, especially after seconday ferment. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is with the thermometer which comes with this. It should be one which gauges higher temperatures, as my solution (though, thankfully I knew) after mixing in the sugar was over the range limit. I can see some people using this and putting in their Scoby to damage because of an inaccurate reading. However, with that, I followed directions and it came out great. Especially after putting in for a secondary ferment for 2 days with different flavors and some additional sugar, and then refrigerator for a day. Looking forward to more! Thanks so much for the easy to follow instructions and superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: which means the scabby was bad when I got it
customer_reviews.text: Scoby was all sorts of messed up and I had to throw my brew away. Followed the directions to a T then found mold on my scabby and did some research and mold is not normal, which means the scabby was bad when I got it. Was super excited to make my Kombucha and was super bummed I couldn't save it, many articles said it was very unsafe to drink. Wasted my allowance:(
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Returned It
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple of times before I returned it. Product never turned out as expected. Huge hassle and ended up with 2 batches of sweet tea with sludge on the bottom. And how is this worth $50? It’s a little bit of tea, sugar, a glass jar, and some yeast starter. I fell for the Shark Tank hype, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Great support and great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that everything needed was included and the directions are very clear. It’s a bit cold in our house and that made it more challenging to get to fermentation quickly. I got very nervous because the tea was still sweet after 14 days. I emailed and got an answer back almost immediately. Wonderful support via email!!! Thanks for that! So far, I am on the second fermentation process with fruit and it all looks like it’s going well :) exciting to be doing something like this and to know I can email and get help
customer_reviews.author: LAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kit.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! Brewing kombucha has become a healthy hobby of mine. It was love at first taste!!! I purchased the deluxe kit. It comes with everything you need to get you started brewing your first batch from the scoby and starter liquid to bottles and cleaning brushes as well as the sugar, tea, pH measuring strips, etc. My first brew turned out great and a nice baby scoby formed on top. If you are looking to get started brewing kombucha, this kit is a great start. It would also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This is a PIECE of a scoby. Literally smaller than a damn Oreo. This is ridiculous, I paid extra to have it shipped. Would NEVER order again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to store bought kombucha
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was tired of spending so much on store bought product that contained a ton of sugar. I've probably made six batches and they're delicious. You control the ingredients and the strength. This pays for itself after abt the second batch. Even better, it creates it's own culture to give to a friend who may want to start brewing. Instructions are very easy to follow and it's fool-proof. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!! Everything needed for brewing your bucha!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! Always wanted to try to make kombucha. This included great, easy instructions! Booklet with all kinds of tips. The only thing I wish this kit contained is more than one muslin tea bag and only one dose of tea. I wish there was at lease 2 or 3 doses and one more bag for the tea. The kombucha came out great! I went on the website for the company and purchased two of there special flavorings which I’ve really enjoyed. I also bought the warming collar which works perfect for keeping your kombucha at an even temp.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sanfillipo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.text: I typically spend $20-$30 per week on kombucha. I have been considering making my own for years and finally tried it and I am so glad I did!!! It’s so much simpler that I expected and turned out great! The only thing I had to buy was a funnel. I reused old kombucha bottles and experimented with a few different flavor ideas (some better than others). I’m now on my second batch. 💕
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend The Kombucha Shop Starter Kit!
customer_reviews.text: We were new to brewing kombucha, when a friend recommended The Kombucha Shop’s starter kit thru Amazon. Our starter kit consistently produces delicious kombucha, and our starter SCOBY keeps producing healthy, new SCOBYs. We can’t say enough positive things about this US-based company, the high quality of their products, packaging, customer service, and the passion they have for brewing! A number of our family and friends brew kombucha, and they talk about the importance of brewing with quality ingredients and a healthy SCOBY. If you are new to making your own kombucha and want an easy, delicious, safe brewing experience, I highly recommend this starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Stevi88

customer_reviews.title: Complete Kit & Comprehensive Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This includes everything (ingredients & materials) you need to start your brew, and also the complete instructions and guidance for the fermentation process(es). The SCOBY was in great shape, and produced a baby within the first brewing process. Geneuine Kombucha taste. I'm on my 3rd batch (each brew took about 10 days), and the baby SCOBY (and Mother) are both in GREAT shape! You could likely buy all the materials and pieces separately, and save just a FEW dollars, but so convenient and reassuring to buy this kit that includes everything........including support (if requried). As compared to the (very few) competition........this is a great deal and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TC kilmal

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, scoby health not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The kit it self is great. Everything worked like advertised. All the tools in the kit are great. The first batch was good, took over 12 days to finish and in the second fermentation wasn’t too carbonated after adding Naked mango juice and peaches to flavor. Only issue I had was on my second brew, around day 6 the scoby that was forming on the top started to get what seemed to be green powdery mold. Left it to see if things would clear up. But ended up getting worse and had to throw it all away. Looking to get another scoby and start again eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Rustam

customer_reviews.title: Save $, brew your own -- it's SUPER easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a convert to making my own kombucha, thanks to this. Their customer support is always there when needed -- like if you go 2 months without making another batch and wonder if the starter 'shroom is still safe, or if the 'shroom simply looks bizarre. I don't even look at the directions any more since they are so easy to remember. Tip: Costco sells huge bags of the organic sugar required for future batches, and the organic Choice brand of oolong tea is cheapest at Natural Grocers (at least where I live).
customer_reviews.author: martello

customer_reviews.title: Great for newcomers and those with experience
customer_reviews.text: This kit is so well made in every aspect that I felt I had to leave a review for it. Although I mainly needed a new Scoby and Jar when I purchased this, and have had much experience making Kombucha before, this kit made it feel so easy. For a newcomer, everything is perfectly measured out. Very clear instructions are given, and the ingredients are all of the highest quality. I highly recommend this to newcomers who might be afraid to make their first batch of Kombucha or to experienced brewers who are in need of some new equipment.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were easy to follow and it came with everything we needed for our first batch. Very easy to adjust for taste and we are currently on our 5th batch since starting with the Kit. The mother scoby was good quality and grew very easily. So much so, in fact, that we've already split it to another jar, and are now brewing two batches from the initial kit. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who's considering brewing their own kombucha at home but doesn't know where to start.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfecter starter
customer_reviews.text: Clear and concise directions. All ingredients were organic and it created a delicious brew. I've now brewed three times since the initial and it lasts about a week if I don't drink too much. The size is good for me as I am the only one drinking it. The instructions were clear and provide good post-brew flavoring directions and ideas as well.
customer_reviews.author: NiceGuy805

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Kombucha, but CAUTION!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Although I absolutely love the Kombutcha that I have made, I want to pass-on a very serious caution and a plea for you to add in the directions booklet included with this item....during the 2nd ferment, YOU MUST "burp" the bottles every day!! This was not included in the instructions and I had no idea. As you can see in the photos, I had one BOTTLE explode (notice glass is every where) and another bottle had all the Kombutcha spray all over my kitchen when I attempted to "burp" the bottle 4 days after the 2nd brew. The exploding bottle could have caused a serious injury and it definitely caused two huge messes!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Duda-Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a Hard Hobby for Morons like Me
customer_reviews.text: Well, I really LOVED everything I got in the kit. Managed to get half a gallon of Kombucha from the Scoby #1 that came with the kit - (after 20 days). Set everything up for 2nd brew and had mold after 3 days. (Big Sigh). Threw Scoby #1 & #2 out, along with tea, per instructions from friends that brew all the time. Although I’m pretty sure that was an operator error on my part because I’m a beginner, I’m pretty bummed that everyone keeps talking about how easy it is to do - but apparently not for a Moron like me. Can’t decide if I should order another one or just drink off of my friends for life. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: BunnieHill

customer_reviews.title: Brewing Kombucha at home with this kit is so much fun!! I adore my SCOBY's.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at trying to brew my own kombucha. It turned out so delicious!! I immediately started my second batch. This is a fantastic starter kit with everything that you need -- just add water. The instructions were very clear and presentation was nice. All of the material included were of high quality. I'm very satisfied with this purchase. Update: Mother SCOBY has produced a daughter SCOBY and they are doing great! I have increased the production from one jar to two. Still getting great results.
customer_reviews.author: Chilipepper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit and had a slight problem with the SCOBY. After contacting the seller, they got back to me immediately and made it their personal mission to get me a replacement ASAP. I got the new SCOBY and started the Kombucha the next day. I just finished the brewing and taste testing of my first batch and it tastes amazing! Making the Kombucha was simple with their easy instructions and the kit has everything you need. I was completely blown away by how great this seller was and would highly recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: sue boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and great results
customer_reviews.text: After a long time of wanting to make kombucha at home due to the high price in grocery stores, this kit was the perfect start. The kit had everything I needed to get the first batch going, including simple instructions. These instructions also provide basic information for second fermentation and a few recipes to try. I did the berry ginger recipe and the result was great! After bottling the first batch, I've saved the original SCOBY that came with the kit and the baby it made. I plan to make my second batch with a different tea to see how it turns out. Excited to try new recipes too in second fermentation.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: first attempt with Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Just started fermenting and wanted to try Kombucha. This kit was fantastic- had everything didn't need to buy anything else to start first batch. The Photo is my second batch brewing and the bottle on left is one of 4 2nd ferments with flavoring. It tastes amazing- Now I hate the funky flavor or store bought. It is just wonderful. I want to buy a second kit to start a different flavored tea and scoby. No other company included the label jar and pens with PH tester. I will keep looking for coupons to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: P Steedman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit.
customer_reviews.text: First, I got this on deals of the day so it was so much cheaper (win). I’ve been drinking kombucha for about 2 years and results work well with my digestion issues. Always wanted to make but didn’t trust my skills. This kit is awesome and it broke it down perfectly and I never felt like I didn’t know what I was doing. In my pic you see a book, that didn’t come with it. I got that for Christmas and used it but you don’t need both. Overall super happy I’m stage 2 and mixed elderberries and lemongrass!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kit
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome kit for a beginner as it has all you need to get started brewing right away. The included items are all quality items and I have had the kit for a few brews now and I have no complaints. The bottles used for the second fermentation and bottling process are very airtight and secure. If you are new to the kombucha scene, as am I, this is a good starter kit. As you learn you can then buy your own ingredients and accessories as needed. very secure latch top.
customer_reviews.author: veritech_13Top Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: Really cool kit to start brewing at home. Great for people who like having projects and like drinking kombucha. There is a little bit of a wait time during the fermentation process, but the scooby grows quickly and you can easily split it into multiple jars and have your own little production going so you have kombuch to drink all the time. Helps if you're organized and can keep track of your days. Really fun experimenting with different flavors. The bottle are kinda small and need to be burped every so often during the 2nd fermentation so you don't have an explosion at the end when you want to taste test it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The instructions are easy to follow and everything arrived in great condition. The company has been more than helpful and will answer any questions you have if you shot them an email from their website. I'd recommend buying a heating wrap for your brew if your house gets cold. I haven't tasted mine yet, but if it's bad that's all on me. They provide very clear instructions on how to flavor, carbonate etc. Supper customizable! There might be a learning curve for first-timers (ME) but this product does all it can.
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Instructions - Foolproof
customer_reviews.text: I got such great results I bought another kit almost immediately. This is a virtually fool-proof Kombucha kit. The ingredients are high quality, the instructions crystal clear and a noob like me just followed the instructions to the letter. The Scoby provided is healthy, happy and fermenting away. The kit literally has everything needed other than water. I got a fantastic result: delicious Kombucha for pennies compared to the commercial product. I plan to buy a few more of these kits as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Da Moogs

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's kit!!
customer_reviews.text: The scoby arrived very healthy and growing. I'm on day 3 of the first brew/fermentation. The only reason I'm not giving 5 starts yet is that it looks like it might be growing a little mold in one tiny area of the floating culture. The other is that I want to post again after I have brewed a successful batch to give a thorough review/report of the results. Best kit I could find, and I spent many hours researching. Best kit for the price, I should say. I'm a beginner, so didn't want to go to high on my first kit.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great results from the first batch!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to kombucha, and wasn't familiar with the process before getting this kit. It is well packaged, and the quick start sheet is very clear. I was able to get good results with the very first batch! I'm on my fifth batch now, and each cycle has gotten even better. I purchased a few commercially bottled kombucha to compare, and really find no difference. The Grolsch type bottles are a big help in getting a good level of carbonation. Having all of the elements in this kit definitely ensured that my brewing would go well at every step. This would be a great gift, and I recommend it to anyone interested in giving homemade kombucha a try.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Skolnick

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT - Stop spending on store bought kombucha
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking Kombucha because of the health benefits but at $2.25 per bottle the habit got pricey. So I thought to myself “Dang! this is a lot of money!” Then one day I watched Shark Tank and saw the lady entrepreneur who had this product. She spoke about how she built a killer company. I want to support entrepreneurs so BOOM I ordered it. I have to admit I was nervous and it took two weeks to open the box and really look at everything. Then I made my first batch and it turned out perfectly. If I can do it, you can too. Excellent product. Super simple. On my third batch. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance would have made this a better experience
customer_reviews.text: The plastic pouch containing the sugar has a massive hole in the seam, whereby ALL of the sugar dumped out of the pouch in transit. Although it was mostly contained inside the glass container, the lid of the glass container was not properly closed. About 1/3 of the sugar leaked out of the glass container into the box which then spilled out when opening the box. I have just finished cleaning the mess, and will throw out the remaining sugar. In order to use the product I will need to not only buy replacement sugar, but clean sugar out of all the other items included in the glass container.
customer_reviews.author: Bessie K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase! When I first started I had a problem (no doubt my fault) - I contacted them and they immediately sent me a replacement Scobi. The lady who helped me was wonderful. I love the fact that everything I needed to get started is included - while it may have been a bit cheaper to buy things separately, I probably never would have gotten started had I done it that way. After drinking store-bought kombucha for years, I am looking forward to developing my own recipes and at some point getting a continuous brew going! I plan to try some of the other teas they sell too.......
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: The Best Way to Start Kombucha Brewing!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before jumping into Kombucha brewing. Made a list of all that I would need. Added up the individual components and decided this kit was the most economical way to start. The laminated instruction sheet is a godsend. Their website is full of answers. I am on my 6th batch and now starting to experiment. It is so much fun and tastes so much better than what you buy. :)
customer_reviews.author: LindaB

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy kombucha again!!!! This was so easy. I am on my third batch already. The second batch came out super. I cut the scoby in half from the first batch and then I had 2 gallons going. It did great. I am now drinking it from the second fermentation and it is soooo fizzy. I flavored with fresh pineapple that I grew, apples and cinnamon, strawberry, and cucumber/mint. They are so good, but I need to be careful when I pop the lid as it sounds like opening a bottle of champagne and it will overflow. Highly recommend this product. Oh, I have 2 more gallons making and will probably divide the scoby again.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: My very first batch of Kombucha came out delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my Kombucha brewing kit. I love kombucha, but it is expensive to purchase in the store. The step by step instructions were very easy to follow for both phase one, and phase 2 flavoring if you want to do that. I did the phase 2 flavoring using 2 recipes from my favorite store bought kombucha, and 2 recipes listed in the Kombucha brewing kit. I have now tasted 3 of my bottles, and can honestly say they all taste better than my favorite store bought Kombucha. I am excited to make my next batch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kombucha brewing kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Kombucha brewing kit! It has all the necessary items to start the kombucha adventure. I've followed the easy instructions and now I am ready to enjoy this delicious drink. I am happy with results. I will recommend this kit and I will purchase as a gift too. 1st picture is day 13th. 2nd picture day 14! I added some other ingredients for flavor - second fermentation and carbonation. Thank you to The kombucha shop for this great opportunity :)
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this kit. The instructions made it really easy, and I’m brewing my second batch right now. I have to work to figure out how to get the taste that I want, but the kit has everything I need to do that. I love the bottles, they’re really thick and sturdy. The only thing I need to purchase is a heater, but that’s because it’s grtying to be winter and kombucha takes too long to brew when it’s cold.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit came with everything I needed to to begin brewing my own kombucha. I have made three batches and they all came out great. I am now beginning a continuous brew. The SCOBY was a little smaller than I expected but in the first brew it grew a huge “baby”. So I started a SCOBY hotel. The instructions that were included in the kit were easy to follow. I’m enjoying my home brewed kombucha!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner set, Healthy Scoby
customer_reviews.text: I used this set for my first kombucha brew. The Scoby sent was large and healthy. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. I had a successful brew the first time producing a large new scoby. I highly recommend this set to any new brewer, along with a heating wrap (not included) to regulate the temperature in colder climates. I don't care for the tea bag that came with it however, and I will be using unbleached disposable tea bags for future brews.
customer_reviews.author: Goatchick2014

customer_reviews.title: Comes with the scoby!
customer_reviews.text: Great date night idea! Since we’ve been quarantined we have wanted to try making our own kombucha. It was an interesting process and turned out tasty. It does come with the scoby nut not the bottles so keep that in mind! Otherwise the directions were clear, recipe book was helpful and really fun activity!
customer_reviews.author: Clairebap

customer_reviews.title: Great Booch!
customer_reviews.text: I've been brewing our own booch for years now, and I have to say that this brewing kit makes booch brewing super easy and pretty stress free. I always watched my booch with the smell and look method (not always successful), but with the temp guide and tips on what exactly to look for for a healthy batch, this is a brewing kit must. We're on our fourth batch with no issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: On My Third Batch!
customer_reviews.text: This Kombucha kit could not have been easier to get me started. I had been putting off trying to make my own because I was afraid I'd mess it up. This kit gives you everything you need to get started, just add water!! I'm really enjoying the process and have such a beautiful new SCOBY from my original mother, that I now have 2 gallon jugs brewing. I'm not going to make any major health claims. All I know is I think it is a delicious low sugar drink that makes me feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Easy, versatile, fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit because I didn't want to spend $4 on a bottle of Kombucha. The directions are step by step and easy to follow, it's not very time consuming to make, and the guide offers a lot of versatility to experiment and find the recipe that works for your taste buds (i.e. type of tea, brewing time, flavors, carbonation level). If you correctly care for the SCOBY, you can continue making kombucha for as long as you'd like :)
customer_reviews.author: Nithya Kumar

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this started kit
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this started kit. It had everything I needed to begin - I have never made Kombucha or known anyone who has. I am on my second batch, but already finished all of the first. Couldn't have been easier! I almost wish there was a "Phase 2" starter pack for bottling. This kit made first brew so easy, I felt I needed to over-research phase 2! Which was also easy. Purchases a bottles, used fruit, vinegar sanitized everything. If you are brand new to Kombucha brewing, you'll be in great hands with this box!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Best Booch I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I have made kombucha several times prior to getting this kit. It took a lot of research and reading and thinking I was doing it less expensive. This kit has all you need, great directions, the tea was great and easy to clean! I wish I would have started with this, but then I would not have appreciated it as much! Thanks for putting together the kit and making the process simple. Now I need to find the tea so I can make another batch, it goes quick in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia O.

customer_reviews.title: A little pricy but.....
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for a beginner, informative and easy instructions. Other than the SCOBY i could have picked up everything i needed at the local grocery store for under $20 but still a great little kit for a beginner like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to brew and worked well.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to follow the instructions and brew Kombucha. It worked out very well. Taste was very good. I also added strawberries, blueberries, and other fruits for additional fermentation, and those were really tasty. Also I had some questions regarding the process, and the customer service was very responsive and cordial. Very good experience!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So fun, great result & inspiring booklet
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and i love trying out different flavors. Great product! You will need more tea (it only comes with one serving... remember to use caffeinated and i recommend actual kombucha tea to preserve flavor). We have a kombucha brewery in Charlotte and i would frequently fill a growler that only lasted me a few days. I would recommend (if you drink kombucha daily) to have a second jar going so there isn’t a gap. The instruction book is all you need and more, to get started and get inspired to build new flavors.
customer_reviews.author: vesna

customer_reviews.title: good kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time starting a brew from scratch and i was a little rusty on how to begin. this came with everything needed to start your first batch along with well written instructions and i loved that they included a pen to write on the jar. it was super quick to get started and a piece of cake to remember the basics with the instruction guide they send
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D

customer_reviews.title: You will never like bought kombucha again!
customer_reviews.text: Warning! Buying this kit may cause you to become a kombucha addict! I’m on batch #7, and it’s fun to make and tastes better than bought kombucha. Not only that but there is no end to the flavors you can make. It has everything you need except bottles. You can buy special bottles or just use bottles you’ve saved. I recommend buying The Big Kombucha Book too because it tells everything you could possibly want to know about kombucha and it has numerous flavoring suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: chet

customer_reviews.title: First batch went great! Got extra Scobys out of it.
customer_reviews.text: First batch done! I might have messed something up because I have 4 scobys growing in my jar by the end or the first batch *Insert crying laughing emoji*. Every time I went to taste it carefully the main scoby sank and then another formed at the top. Well if one dies I got 3 more super healthy ones. hahahaha. If I'm doing something wrong let me know because their all healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Seils

customer_reviews.title: Best starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came within 24 hours and was exactly what I was expecting. No flaws in the packaging, everything inside was ready to go. The SCOBY was perfect and I immediately started brewing my first batch with this kit. The staff at The Kombucha Store is great. I had a question and they replied very quickly, within a day. I had no issues following the directions on the guide and it makes a fantastic brew!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hainley

customer_reviews.title: So very easy!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared when we got this for Christmas. Would I kill it? Would I kill us? It's so very easy. On batch #3. As soon as a batch is done and bottled, another one goes in. I follow their easy directions still very closely. Any questions I have had I have easily answered myself on their site. Still working on getting the timing and flavor perfect for our family, but all of it has been very drinkable and been gobbled up.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Baker

customer_reviews.title: for so long wanted to make Kombucha at home and this kit was the perfect way to make my first
customer_reviews.text: I, for so long wanted to make Kombucha at home and this kit was the perfect way to make my first, with no anxiety. Everything was at my fingertips.I just bottled my first batch and am making my next brew today for my next batch of Kombucha. What I really liked is everything was nice and neat in the kit with step by step instructions. I liked that I had a website to run to with questions and access to more recipes. My experience was truly flawless and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The best brewing kit hands down
customer_reviews.text: If you're brewing for the first time this kit is perfect. The scoby was in perfect condition, the instructions and equipment were everything I needed to get started. I used my old GT bottles to do my second fermentation, they came out incredible, watermelon kiwi was the family favorite but we're going to try dozens of other flavors. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Soares

customer_reviews.title: ... received this as a gift and it is a great gift! You aren't just buying a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and it is a great gift! You aren't just buying a starter kit, you're buying great customer service. First off, I am a complete novice brewer and this gave me the confidence and instructions to confidently brew. It includes absolutely everything you need. However, during my first attempt something went wrong and my batch molded. I was devastated but with the contact information to the Kombucha shop, they were able to answer my questions quickly and efficiently. To top it all off, they replaced my SCOBY, my tea, and the sugar for free so I could restart. I couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit! Easy Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Had everything needed to brew your own Kombucha. Instructions are great, easy to follow and resulted in a great first batch of Kombucha. If you like Kombucha, but are tired of paying $3-5 per bottle, buy this and brew your own. It is easy and tastes great. Lot's of great benefits to drinking Kombucha as well. I feel great and have cut out soda almost completely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Atherley

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Effort
customer_reviews.text: It makes a nice tasting tea, but the effort is not worth it for me. Read what you have to do to make the tea before you buy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Beta

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! Makes it easy to start brewing.
customer_reviews.text: Homemade tastes so much better than store bought! I love how everything I needed in the deluxe kit was included to make it simple to start brewing. Others complained about the price, but I compared prices. If I had bought everything separately, it would have been the same or more!
customer_reviews.author: Katey B

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one box!
customer_reviews.text: We followed the easy to read and follow step by step instructions for our first batch of kombucha. The quality was amazing - we added fresh lemon juice and frozen berries to the second fermentation process and Voila! flavorful, fizzy Kombucha! Definitely worth the purchase. We are now experimenting with other flavor teas and are on our third batch!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Cody

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kit for someone who is just starting to get into Kombucha brewing! I am now on to my second batch- the first one turned out great. The instructions are super easy to follow and the kit also includes a how to on adding flavor if you are interested in doing that too. Zero complaints - I actually just bought a second gallon glass jar so that I can get two batches going at the same time. I highly recommend this easy to use kit!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fun and saves some money on grocery store Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed making my first batch of Kombucha with this set. Everything I needed was included, along with clear instructions. My two boys helped and enjoyed watching the SCOBY grow as it worked. We've enjoyed it enough that we bought a couple more glass jars and we currently have two going at a time on our 3rd batch.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I love kombucha and now I can brew my own!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to get started brewing kombucha and I love the tea that comes with it. Also the funnel is a must. If I had to change one thing I would wish the brewing vessel had a spout, but that would drive up cost so I understand. If you are getting into kombucha you need to get this kit.
customer_reviews.author: JP2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy start on home brewing kombucha
customer_reviews.text: The materials and ingredients are pretty basic, but the quality is good. I've done some minor brewing in the past so I had a basic grasp on the process. If you know how to follow directions and keep clean this should be a no-brainer for most folks. I'm currently working on my second batch with some added ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Johnstan

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: I have made 6 or so batches of Kombucha with this so far. It was easy to start and the instruction card is perfect. After the first brew you use your own sugar and tea of 1 cup sugar, 3-4 tablespoons of tea. I use disposable tea bag filtersas the cloth one included with the kit never cleaned up well. The only issue I had was I put the stick on thermometer a little too high up on the jar, and so I can't always tell the temperature is cool enough after I've added the hot sweet tea and the cool water as the top of the thermometer is above the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa (Hartford CT)

customer_reviews.title: First Batch
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get you fermenting. The instructions eased my fear of failure. The instructions made the procedure simple and clear. Would recommend to anyone willing to make a healthy carbonated beverage. Made two Batches of Kombucha, both came out better then expected. Kombucha is so easy to make. I flavor mine with concentrated cherry juice, excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome J Matyjakowski

customer_reviews.title: Includes all the things you didn’t realize that you needed
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. I liked how it came with little things such as pH strips, a temperature strip to attach to the jar, and a little pipette to easily test the doneness that I wouldn’t have thought of if I bought everything individually. These things are little but make a big difference such as making sure it’s brewing at the right temperature (its winter here and so it alerted me to move away from an exterior wall) and make it so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Auroraura

customer_reviews.title: great kit, great support
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this kit and company. When I reached out to them with brewing questions, they looked at my photos, asked follow up questions and provided detailed instructions for my next batch. Truly impressive customer service. The cloth could be a bit bigger, but it works, and is better than other kits I have gotten elsewhere with a cloth that had holes too big and a rubber band that was way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tidball

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for beginners like me. My first jar did not reach the proper fermented level after a month. I contacted TKS because I wasn't sure if I did anything wrong. Turned out it was just the cold weather. A couple of days later, the SCOBY turned moldy. I contacted them again and they sent me a new SCOBY. 2nd time is a charm, I'm happy to report that it was a success and I started my 3rd jar. Alana from TKS was super helpful. Thank you so much. I know this kit is expensive but it worth every penny because you'll get the starter kit and the amazing customer support.
customer_reviews.author: trinh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit, BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Consider putting instructions for additional batches. Your ingredients for the first batch are pre-measured, leaving customer confused as to how much needed for future batches.
customer_reviews.author: cbcdave

customer_reviews.title: A must have !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for beginners! The instructions are clear and the online customer service prompt and helpful. I had to ask a question about the type of water needed and got a reply very fast. I am thrilled to be able to do mine overseas. I recommend the kit and the shop to anyone interested in improving their health and enjoying a delicious beverage!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a fantastic purchase. I'm completely addicted to making kombucha now
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. I'm completely addicted to making kombucha now! I will admit, the first time I brewed I had no idea what to expect. The Scoby is something else but once you get used to it, it's fun to watch it do its magic and I love the final results. I am a kombucha addict for life now. I drink it daily. Once you taste your homemade brew, you'll never buy store bought again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Lambe

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my review from a 1 to 5 stars. My product was shipped and it came to me broken. I posted a review asking for help and with 30 minutes someone from this company contacted me and shipped me a new jar within a few days. I will definitely be using this company from now on. Love their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best investments I’ve made. It came with everything I (as a beginner) would need to make my own Kombucha at home. Including some very detailed, foolproof instructions. From the brewing to the flavor/bottling my first batch turned out great. In fact, my husband, who was very dubious about purchasing the kit, actually likes and drinks the homemade and doesn’t like the store bought. That alone was a win. Getting ready to make my second batch, just waiting for another Kombucha jar heating wrap to make my SCOBY hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is affordable and provides everything you need to start your brew! (minus the jars). I ended up using mason jars and purchasing cheap and cute jars from the thrift store. The directions are very detailed and easy to follow. After the first brew, I've been using my own teas instead of their brand to save money. This has worked fine for me so far. Love brewing my own kombucha - such a $ saver compared to the store, and it's so fun too :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: One stop shopping kit for Kombucha Newbies
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit because I was able to make kombucha from step by step instructions in a simple manner that didn’t waste my time by having to watch a zillion videos and buy from a bunch of sources, hoping I bought the right thing. Yes. It was expensive for what it is, but it saved me time and eliminated issues that would likely have cropped up, had I not bought the kit. I was done make kombucha is less than an hour, and it is now fermenting happily.
customer_reviews.author: metalsmith

customer_reviews.title: Excited but not sure where it’s going?
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to start brewing kombucha at home. The instructions are informative and very easy to follow. My brew is on day 7 and has been kept in a dark corner on my counter but the scoby is starting to look a little weird. I know sinking is okay but it seems that something, possibly a baby scoby? Is growing not on but next to my original scoby and my brew still tastes like very sweet black tea. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: りいちゃん

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well done for new people to the scene!
customer_reviews.text: I actually started my own batch a few days prior to this arriving without a pellicle, it's not needed, but it definitely makes a different. The batch using this kit took almost half the time to be ready, and the quality of the taste and so on was amazing. Extremely well done, easy to follow instructions, good quality items. 10/10 would recommend to anyone wanting to start their own batch!
customer_reviews.author: Abizieff

customer_reviews.title: Brewing Kombucha can seem like a daunting task to a first-time brewer such as ...
customer_reviews.text: Brewing Kombucha can seem like a daunting task to a first-time brewer such as me. But the KBS made the process simple and rewarding. Everything to you need is included and the instructions are clear and concise. I've since bought 3 more jars and am brewing 4 different flavored kombuchas at once! My coworkers and house mates are always asking me for a bottle. For something so tasty, it's health benefits are an amazing plus. 5 amazing stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mother and she ended up using and LOVING it! She wasn't sure how it was going and took her creation to a fermentation studio type place and they told her it looked perfect. I had some of the kombucha she made and it was great! Wonderful gift for people who are into this sort of thing, and it was fun for her to DIY.
customer_reviews.author: ADP

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have made Kombucha tea before, however, with this kit it was a little disappointing. Everything arrived as described and the Scoby looked happy and healthy and ready to get to work. After following directions the happy Scoby was starting his journey into tea makeing. Then things went bad. He started developing spots, and it just seemed like he died. My poor happy Scoby didn't make it. We had a tiny funeral for the poor dead Scoby, and have vowed to retry!! Maybe it was just my SCOBY, but I ended up having to purchase a kombucha tea from Raleys in memory of my lost and beloved Scoby.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Musick

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Need to order a heating pad
customer_reviews.text: Seems expensive but overall good package. Not yet finished brewing. I had a rough start because temperature in our house is around 67 degrees and lower at night. A heating pad is a must to maintain optimum temperature of 76 degrees. Recommend the 7 Penn $10 pad that does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lady C

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I hot one for my friend for her birthday and we did our first ever batch together. Then i decide to ask for one for Chistmas so I could start brewing my own and both times everything went absolutely great. I am on my third batch now. I had to buy a heating mat to put around the vase because it's been so cold here it was taking too long to ferment. Once I got the mat on and the temperature on the vase was about 74 things started to happen super fast. Such a fun project that ends up in yummy kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: Selma santos

customer_reviews.title: Quality company!
customer_reviews.text: I first learned of this company on Shark Tank. All of the sharks were so impressed. I ordered my brewing kit and am on my second brew. The Kombucha Shop has made this so easy. They've answered every question in their accompanying literature. Every piece and accessory is high quality. They have gone over and beyond what a customer would want or expect from a product or company. So impressed! Dona Rogers
customer_reviews.author: Dona Rogers

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hello, Thank you very much for a wonderful komboucha deluxe kit. There I foud everything I've needed. It was very simple to use. I've already made twice komboucha from the lemon verbena tea. It is very nice refreshing lemonade. The SCOBY is growing very nicely. The jar is marvellouse, very comfortable and optimal size, and good opening, also the bottles are very pretty and comfortable. All the kit is excellent. Next time I'll try the organic tea from the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Over all amazing!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing starter kit! Very impressed with the easy instructions that it came with. The Scoby was nice and healthy and produced an outstanding kombucha- better then any store bought one! I’m actually going to purchase another kit as a gift for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: great kit, easy to execute, love it!
customer_reviews.text: so glad I ordered this kit! made my first ever Kombucho making adventure easy and fun. Great quality product, easy to understand instructions, tasty end product too. I will be a forever Kombucho drinking and making customer! only thing I wished I had understood is that this kit does not come with the bottles, but this was my mistake. I quickly and easliy ordered bottles from the company and they arrived quickly. They do make a kit that includes bottles. if you are on the fence on ordering, rest assured, you will not be disappointed in this kit
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brislin

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The Kombucha Shop is absolutely amazing. This came with everything I needed to get started and bottle my first batch of Kombucha. The scoby was healthy and grew very fast. The instructions and tips were super easy to understand and very useful! The customer service is one of the best! Any questions, feel free to call them and ask. They are very willing to help. 100% percent would recommend to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan McAnally

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: The Kit is great and it's so easy to set up and use. They include everything you need to get you brewing quickly. My only problem has been keeping my brew at a warm enough temp. It's too cold in my house. I've moved it around, wrapped it in a blanket, tried a heating pad (which my husband keeps taking back for his back!). I finally broke down and purchased a heat wrap. It hasn't arrived yet, but once it gets here I should be able to get my first batch done quickly. My whole family is exicted about the brew. We all love Kombucha tea and we've got a whole bunch of recipes to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Starting Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started fermenting Kombucha and I mean everything! The starter "mother" Scoby was good sized and in 1 week actually doubled in size. My first batch of Kombucha was done in 8 days (to my taste). The Scoby was alive and healthy. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. When I get to the point that I need another starter, I am going right here to get another one of the Kombucha Brewing Kit with Organic Kombucha Scoby from The Kombucha Shop. Excellent product that I am very happy with. Thank you The Kombucha Shop for offering this on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Harrison

product_meta.title: Deluxe Kombucha Brewing Kit - Six Swing Top Bottles, Stainless Steel Funnel, Custom Bottle Brush & Our Original Brewing Kit
product_meta.description:
Style Name:DeluxeWith our Deluxe Kombucha Brewing Kit you have everything you need to start brewing like a pro. 

Our 1 gallon Kombucha Brewing Kit + six swing top bottles + bottle brush + stainless steel funnel and strainer set.

Save money by buying all of your necessary supplies for both brewing and bottling in one kit!

Inside the Deluxe Kombucha Brewing Kit is: 1 gallon Kombucha Brewing Kit + six swing top bottles + bottle brush + stainless steel funnel and strainer set



 * 1 Gallon Brew Jar w/ lid
 * Organic Kombucha Culture & Starter Tea
 * Organic Sugar
 * Organic Tea Blend by Rishi Tea
 * Reusable Cotton Tea Bag
 * Temperature Strip
 * Cotton Cover & Rubberband
 * Ph Test Strips
 *  Pipet Straw
 *  Step by Step Directions
feature_bullets: EVERYTHING TO BREW & BOTTLE: Save money and time purchasing all of the equipment to brew and bottle in one custom kit. Our Deluxe Brewing Kit includes six 16 oz. Swing Top Bottles made of thick glass with a strong gasket. The perfect bottles for making fizzy and delicious Kombucha
CUSTOM SUPPLIES: Includes a Bendable Bottle Brush. Custom made for our 16 oz. bottles and fits those hard to reach corners
NO SPILLS: Includes a well made Stainless Steel Funnel and Strainer Set. Finally bottle and strain your kombucha with ease
COMPLETE STARTER KIT: Includes our 1 Gallon Kombucha Brewing Kit - All the essential ingredients to get you started and the kombucha culture and equipment to keep you going

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
